GSD.product_version: versions from v5.1 to before v5.16.19
GSD.description:
net: hns3: add vlan list lock to protect vlan list

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.19 by commit 09e383ca97e798f9954189b741af54b5c51e7a97, it was introduced in version v5.1 by commit c6075b193462d9a3930fb41f587f94720658752a. For more details please see the references link.
